paper_abstract: In this paper, we offer a simple and accurate clustering algorithm which was derived as a closed-form analytical solution to a cluster fit function minimization problem. As a result, the algorithm finds the global minimum of the fit function, and combines exceptional efficiency with optimal clustering results. (c) 2005 Pattern Recognition Society. Published by Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Analytically tractable case of fuzzy c-means clustering
